body:
Any mods that are really useful for 1.8 pvp?

Well, the things I use'
are 
Cheatbreaker Hud 
Chroma Toggle Sneak
Reach Displayer Mod
Sidebar Mod
Particle Mod
Orange 1.7 Animations
Better FPS

Anymore mods i should use?
